attributes.action: Change the law to allow judges to pass the death sentence for sex murderers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sex murder is the most henious of all crimes. Whilst one persons terrorist is anothers freedom fighter, the sex murderer is the most foul and self indulgent predator.  Perpetrators may often be linked to their crimes by forensic science, meaning that miscarriages of justice will become a thing of the past. The death sentence, will bring to society and the victims families, a sense of proper justice, it will permanently reduce the risk to society of that individual and servce as a deterent.  It will also be highly cost effective.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
